name: Ghost Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner phantom! Conjure up spooky and spectral names with our Ghost Name Generator. Perfect for your next D&D character, chilling story, or just for a ghostly giggle.
introduction: Ready to haunt the digital realm with a name that sends shivers down spines? Our Ghost Name Generator is your spectral sidekick, crafting eerie and ethereal monikers that are sure to make a lasting impression. Whether you're seeking a name for a mischievous poltergeist, a wise old specter, or a terrifying phantom, we've got you covered. Prepare to be spooked... by how awesome your new name is!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and watch as the ghostly magic unfolds!
Feeling picky? Keep clicking until a name that truly haunts you appears.
Found the perfect name? Copy it and unleash it upon the world! (Or your next gaming session.)
Want a name that's *really* you? Tweak the generated names – add a flourish, change a letter, make it your own spectral signature!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: While we provide these names for fun and inspiration, it's always best to do your own research to ensure the name isn't already trademarked or in use. We don't guarantee exclusive rights to any generated name.

faqs.question: Are the names actually random?
faqs.answer: Yes! We use a complex algorithm (aka a bunch of spooky code) to ensure each name is generated randomly, combining prefixes and suffixes in unexpected and haunting ways.

faqs.question: Will the Ghost Name Generator steal my soul?
faqs.answer: Absolutely not! We promise to only steal your *attention* with awesome names. Your soul is perfectly safe...probably.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your suggestions! Send them our way – who knows, your idea might just become a new ghostly classic.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep generating! With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that resonates with your inner ghost. And remember, you can always tweak a name to make it your own!

faqs.question: Is this generator suitable for all ages?
faqs.answer: While the names are generally spooky and fun, some might be a bit intense for very young children. Parental guidance is recommended, especially if little ones are easily spooked.
